languages.text: {n}Долгую секунду Иокаста молчит, а затем мрачно ухмыляется.{/n} "Я не стану скорбеть о Махарии, хоть мне и будет не хватать этого несносного сноба. Я постараюсь искупить позор, что лег на мое родовое имя, верной службой. Во имя поколений, что служили Вольным Торговцам верой и правдой".

{n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."
languages.original_text: {n}Долгую секунду Иокаста молчит, а затем мрачно ухмыляется.{/n} "Я не стану скорбеть о Махарии, хоть мне и будет не хватать этого несносного сноба. Я постараюсь искупить позор, что лег на мое родовое имя, верной службой. Во имя поколений, что служили Вольным Торговцам верой и правдой".

I will strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service. For the sake of our generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

{n}There is a long pause. Then Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I will strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service. For the sake of our generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

{n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

{n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

languages.text: {n}Se produce una larga pausa. Después, Sauerback esboza una sonrisa sombría.{/n} «No lloraré por la muerte de Macharius, aunque echaré de menos a ese pedante insufrible. Me esforzaré para redimir el nombre de mi familia a través de mi fiel servicio, para honrar a las generaciones que fueron leales a los Comerciantes Independientes de su dinastía».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce una larga pausa. Después, Sauerback esboza una sonrisa sombría.{/n} «No lloraré por la muerte de Macharius, aunque echaré de menos a ese pedante insufrible. Me esforzaré para redimir el nombre de mi familia a través de mi fiel servicio, para honrar a las generaciones que fueron leales a los Comerciantes Independientes de su dinastía».

languages.text: {n}長い沈黙が続いた。その後、ザウアーバックが怪しい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「マチャリウスの死を悼むつもりはありません。ですが、同時にあの忍びない俗物がいないのは寂しい。私は奉仕を通じて家名を挽回するよう努めます。陛下の家系のローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓った代々のためにも」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

traits.locale_text: {n}長い沈黙が続いた。その後、ザウアーバックが怪しい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「マチャリウスの死を悼むつもりはありません。ですが、同時にあの忍びない俗物がいないのは寂しい。私は奉仕を通じて家名を挽回するよう努めます。陛下の家系のローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓った代々のためにも」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克停顿了很久，之后露出了严峻的笑容。{/n}“我并不打算缅怀马卡里乌斯，尽管我确实会怀念那个让人无法忍受的势利小人。为了那些生前曾忠诚服侍您的家族成员，我将忠贞不渝地为您服务，以此努力挽回我的家族声誉。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克停顿了很久，之后露出了严峻的笑容。{/n}“我并不打算缅怀马卡里乌斯，尽管我确实会怀念那个让人无法忍受的势利小人。为了那些生前曾忠诚服侍您的家族成员，我将忠贞不渝地为您服务，以此努力挽回我的家族声誉。”

languages.text: {n}Es folgt eine lange Pause. Dann lächelt Sauerback grimmig.{/n} "Ich werde Macharius' Tod nicht betrauern, obwohl ich den unerträglichen Wichtigtuer vermissen werde. Ich werde danach streben, den Namen meiner Familie durch erstklassige Dienste wiederherzustellen, zum Wohle der Generationen, die den Freihändlern der Linie Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} loyal ergeben waren."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es folgt eine lange Pause. Dann lächelt Sauerback grimmig.{/n} "Ich werde Macharius' Tod nicht betrauern, obwohl ich den unerträglichen Wichtigtuer vermissen werde. Ich werde danach streben, den Namen meiner Familie durch erstklassige Dienste wiederherzustellen, zum Wohle der Generationen, die den Freihändlern der Linie Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} loyal ergeben waren."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback reste sans voix un long moment, puis elle esquisse un sourire sombre.{/n} « Je n'ai aucune intention de pleurer la mort de Macharius, même si cet insupportable snobinard va me manquer. Je m'efforcerai de laver le nom de ma famille par mes états de service irréprochables, pour toutes ces générations qui sont restées fidèles aux libres-marchands de votre lignée, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback reste sans voix un long moment, puis elle esquisse un sourire sombre.{/n} « Je n'ai aucune intention de pleurer la mort de Macharius, même si cet insupportable snobinard va me manquer. Je m'efforcerai de laver le nom de ma famille par mes états de service irréprochables, pour toutes ces générations qui sont restées fidèles aux libres-marchands de votre lignée, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Uzun bir duraksama oluyor. Ardından Sauerback, gaddarca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Macharius'un ölümü için yas tutma niyetim yok. Yine de o katlanılamaz züppeyi özleyeceğim. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin soyundan gelen Hür Tacirlere sadık nesiller adına, yılmaz hizmetlerimle ailemin adını temize çıkarmak için çabalayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Then, Sauerback smiles grimly.{/n} "I do not intend to mourn Macharius's death, although I will miss the insufferable snob. I shall strive to redeem my family name through unwavering service, for the sake of the generations who were loyal to the Rogue Traders of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s line."
